info.name: Youtube - immersive mode
info.description:
• Expands the large player (click ▭) to display in maximal size.
• Preference to autohide the top masthead toolbar (default visible).
• Hide the cursor by hovering over the video edge.
• Displays title of video in search bar (Firefox only).
• Resizes accordingly if window size is changed.
• Tested only on Youtube's new material design.
info.additionalInfo: • Update to Firefox 19+ or Chrome 26+. • Please provide feedback, YouTube is constantly updating itself. • If you like it please consider making a small donation below.
